entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Port Carling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 6:33 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: E 11 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
